title: The Way Of The Mecha Tamer! ~I Started Playing This Game Because I Wanted To Be Loved By Fluffy Animals, But Now I’m Becoming The Strongest With Mechanical Creatures—Why Is This Happening?~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Sci-fi   Shoujo Ai
author: ノドグロ
description:
Yume Ayukawa (real name: Ayumu Hinomoto) begins playing the VRMMO “Glory Crown” to become a “video game streamer”.

She’s allergic to animals, but she still wanted to play with the fluffy beast monsters of this world.

As a consequence, she chose “Tame” as her beginning skill, but this world wasn’t going to be so easy on her.

In the beginning, players are randomly awarded a title, but she ended up getting “Anti-Animal”.

It had the effect of making her despised by beasts.

She cried over it, but it seems that this title had a secret--?

Yume's video game streamer career, and her future title of 'The Wild Last Boss' and the 'Demon King' by players and viewers alike, are about to begin.>
